books.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel of warmth and humor, despite dealing with serious issues of rape and racial inequality.
A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, exploring themes of surveillance and propaganda.

books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A romantic novel that also critiques the British landed gentry of the early 19th century.

books.name: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A critique of the American Dream set in the Roaring Twenties, through the tragic story of Jay Gatsby.

books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: The story of teenage Holden Caulfield, his struggles with identity, belonging, and alienation.

books.name: Moby-Dick
books.description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge between man and whale aboard the Pequod.

books.name: The Lord of the Rings
books.description: An epic fantasy saga about the battle between good and evil, centered around the One Ring.

books.name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, introducing the magical world and the boy wizard.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.description: A fantasy adventure following Bilbo Baggins' journey to win a share of treasure guarded by a dragon.

books.name: War and Peace
books.description: A sweeping tale of war, politics, and love during the Napoleonic era in Russia.

books.name: Jane Eyre
books.description: The story of an orphaned girl who overcomes hardship and becomes a strong, independent woman.

books.name: Crime and Punishment
books.description: A psychological exploration of guilt and redemption after a man commits a murder.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.description: A young shepherd’s journey to realize his personal legend and fulfill his dreams.

books.name: Frankenstein
books.description: A gothic novel exploring the dangers of playing God and the consequences of scientific hubris.

books.name: The Book Thief
books.description: A story narrated by Death about a girl living in Nazi Germany who finds solace in stealing books.

books.name: The Chronicles of Narnia
books.description: A fantasy series where children travel to the magical world of Narnia to fight evil and restore peace.

books.name: Brave New World
books.description: A futuristic dystopian society controlled by technology, conditioning, and a lack of personal freedom.

books.name: Little Women
books.description: A coming-of-age story about four sisters navigating life, love, and ambition during the Civil War.

books.name: Little Women
books.description: The lives and adventures of the four March sisters during the American Civil War era.
